column2: You wish to work in a challenging technical environment!      You are passionate about working on complex and innovative processes! Then this job is made for you!      Assigned to projects involving different technologies (refining, petrochemicals, biofuels and renewables) within the Process Group, you will be involved into international projects and quickly supervising activities of Axens process engineers.          Your main activities will be:            ?     - Supervise and manage the Process team work on license or module projects,      - Participation in the development of Process Books in designing the equipment and preparing the specifications for Vessels, Pumps, Heat Exchangers, Air Coolers and Heaters)      - Develop thermal rating of heat exchange equipment (heat exchangers and air coolers),      - Train Process Engineers and develop coaching/trainings for them,      - Coordinate the activities with other departments (Drafting, Engineering, Project),      - Projects follow-up with D.E.C / E.P.C including engineering documents review,      - Participate to client meetings (PFD and PID review, HAZOP, SIL Review, 3D model Review, etc).      - Opportunity to participate in start-up of units on special assignments with the Technical Service Department      ?       QUALIFICATION AND EXPERIENCE        ?     - Masters Degree or a higher equivalent in chemical or process engineering      - You have at least 4 years of experience within an engineering company or within the refining, petrochemical or gas industry or within chemical or biochemical industries.      - Successful experience of team management on project,      - You are experienced in Process basic and/or detail engineering tasks, such as:      - Process Modeling using chemical engineering softwares (Pro II, Hysys, etc),      - Equipment specification (pumps, compressors, drums, etc),      - Process flow diagrams, Piping and Instrumentation Diagrams (PID),      - Thermal rating (using HTRI software),      - Process control and Safety.      - An experience on units operations support would be a plus.      - A fluent level of English is mandatory, other language(s) appreciated.      - Curious and open-minded, you are motivated in working in an international environment,      - You are agile in working in collaborative organizations, and multi-cultural company.
column11: Water treatment, Team management, Pumps, Process control, HAZOP, thermal, Instrumentation, Heat exchangers, Biomass, Petrochemical

column2: Performs tasks based on established procedures.     Uses data organizing and coordination skills to support the business and perform technical work.     Requires vocational training, certifications, licensures, or equivalent experience.         General Profile         Developed proficiency within a range of analytical or operational processes.     Completes assignments and facilitates the work of others.     May coordinate assignments beyond work area.     Proposes improvements to processes and methods.     Acts as a lead, coordinating the work of others, but is not a supervisor.     Works autonomously within established procedures.         Functional Knowledge         Developed skills in a range of processes, procedures, and systems.     Acts as a technical expert in some areas.         Business Expertise         Understanding of how best teams integrate and work together to achieve company goals.         Impact         Impacts a team, by example, through the quality service and information provided.     Proposes enhancements to work procedures and practices to improve efficiency.         Leadership         Serves as a team lead.     Allocates work to team members, as appropriate.     Provides subject matter guidance to junior team members.         Problem Solving         Provides solutions to problems based on existing challenges or procedures.         Interpersonal Skills         Effectively exchanges information and ideas.     Uses tact when working with others.         Responsibility Statements         Manages more complex tasks that are escalated due to issues.     Acts as a domain expert.     Ensures TAT is met for all volumes assigned to respective shifts through proper planning.     Ensures quality and volume is met during shifts.     Coordinates appropriate staffing and interviews candidates.     Collaborates with supervisors on key performance measures set by the client.     Facilitates work allocation.     Tracks/monitors daily and monthly reporting.     Participates in progress improvement without impacting the quality of work.     Communicates with teams and managers to provide work status.     Participates in meetings with internal teams and external clients.     Performs other duties as assigned.     Complies with all policies and standards.
